Jazz, the American Invention #2: Three Generations of Jazz Piano - Roland Hanna, Eubie Blake, Danny Mixon (Tape 1 of 2)
Jazz, the American Invention #2: Three Generations of Jazz Piano - Roland Hanna, Eubie Blake, Danny Mixon (Tape 1 of 2)
Performers on this recording include Eubie Blake, Roland Hanna, and Danny Mixon.

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes: "As with other tapes in this collection, there is an inherent constant sync error that is stabilized by time base correction, but ultimately results in various errors throughout. The first minute and 45 seconds have been captured with a different TBC than the rest of the tape. Jitter and flicker observed during this first portion was more acceptable here than in later portions. Similarly, the mild skew error observed for the majority of the tape was much more severe in this first portion. The combination of these two captures represents the best transfer possible. Elsewhere, there are occasional momentary sync errors, seemingly triggered by variations in exposure inherent to the content. Occasional dropouts and tape damage throughout. Head switch error visible throughout, especially pronounced during first segment."
